title: BRIEF-Primoris Services Corp Announces Procurement Phase Of Engineering & Supply Award

organizations.name: brief-primoris services corp announces procurement phase of engineering & sup
brief-primoris services corp announces procurement phase of engineering

text:
41 PM / in 15 minutes BRIEF-Primoris Services Corp Announces Procurement Phase Of Engineering & Supply Award Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
Jan 23 (Reuters) - Primoris Services Corp: 
* PRIMORIS SERVICES CORPORATION ANNOUNCES PROCUREMENT PHASE OF ENGINEERING & SUPPLY AWARD VALUED AT OVER $30 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
